thread.title: Truck driver's nail-biting near miss caught on camera
thread.title_full: Truck driver's nail-biting near miss caught on camera

author: Published Hrs
title: Truck driver's nail-biting near miss caught on camera
text:
Share Truck driver's nail-biting near miss caught on camera 
A dramatic video has captured the moment a truck driver regained control after his vehicle swerved and nearly struck a car on a busy motorway. 
The footage shows the lorry travelling along the road when all of a sudden it appears to lose control and drift across the three-lane highway tilted, up on its wheels. 
The truck then continues to veer sideways, narrowly avoiding a collision with a dark-coloured car as it moves across the lanes. 
Miraculously as the lorry reaches the centre of the motorway it flips back over onto its wheels so it is once again level. 
According to LiveLeak the nail-biting near miss took place in South Korea. 
Source: LiveLeak
